queryData.totalQuery: select count(sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID) from AM_SUBSCRIPTION sub where sub.API_ID IN (select api.API_ID from AM_API api where api.CONTEXT {{contextCondition}}) group by sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID
queryData.weekQuery: select count(sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID) from AM_SUBSCRIPTION sub where sub.API_ID IN (select api.API_ID from AM_API api where api.CONTEXT {{contextCondition}}) AND sub.CREATED_TIME between '{{weekStart}}' and '{{weekEnd}}' group by sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID
